roleset.name: enacted (as if) without a conscience
roleset.note: UNCONSCIONABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. (from unconscionable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Arguably Libya is a different matter entirely and it would be unconscionable to watch Gaddafi slaughter his own people , but it would be inappropriate and infeasible for Britain to go it alone
example.arg: to watch Gaddafi slaughter his own people
